issue.title: [Rust] Inconsistent use of import arrow:: vs crate::arrow::
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Both the DataFusion and Parquet crates have a mix of "import arrow::" and "import crate::arrow::" and we should standardize on one or the other.

 

Which ever standard we use should be enforced in build.rs so CI fails on PRs that do not follow the standard.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9847?focusedCommentId=17209903) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~andygrove]` Is it going to make into 2.0? If not please postpone to 3.0.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9847?focusedCommentId=17332124) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/100
